aboutUs.title: Exclusive Lifestyle Club
aboutUs.desc1: Wise Premium allows you access to the World of Privileged, explore the infinite possibilities and indulge a plush lifestyle which only the elite have access to. Seize powerful financial analysis opportunities with Wise Premium valued programs.

content1.title: Lifestyle
content1.desc: Wise Premium offers access to exclusive deals, discounts and luxury lifestyle. From fine dining to luxury yacht and more, Wise Premium members enjoy personalized access to travel deals that fit their interest.

content2.title: Concierge
content2.desc: With our concierge service, you’ll always have a virtual personal assistant by your side taking care of all your arrangements, from making reservations to booking your next trip. We save your time and let you enjoy a smooth life.

content3.title: Networking session
content3.desc: Join us for an opportunity to meet other members and expand your network to enhance and strengthen your business connections.

content4.title: Affiliate programs
content4.desc: You can enjoy exclusive deals and offers from our partners when you shop at their store. Take advantage of these amazing offers, which are just for you!

cards.title: Discover More
cards.desc: Become our member and enjoy the features

lifestyle.title: Wise Premium Lifestyle
lifestyle.desc: Wise Premium is a community of exclusive and luxury lovers who want more for their lifestyle. We introduce you to an exclusive world you’ve always dreamed of. We offer insider access to the most sought after travel events, entertainment and financial insights

content1.title: Fast & easy
content1.desc: Just download the Wise Premium mobile app, register and you are good to go. Secure and convenient.

content2.title: 100% transparent
content2.desc: Easily access and manage all your accounts balance, transactions and card details in one place, on one mobile platform.

content3.title: Discount on travel
content3.desc: Save precious time and money while making all your travel arrangements with Wise Premium virtual assistant.

content4.title: Competitive exchange rates
content4.desc: We offer a competitive exchange rates for your purchase our club credits.

content5.title: 24/7 support
content5.desc: Our 24/7 support team provides immediate assistance with all issues or questions. We are always here to help!

content6.title: Use with ease
content6.desc: You can seamlessly spend your club credit with Wise Premium card.

features1.title: 24/7 support
features1.desc: We provide you with 24/7 access to our professional and dedicated concierge team. Whether it’s a restaurant reservation or planning an excursion, we’re here to help you make your travel easy.

features2.title: Convenience & save time
features2.desc: We’re the experts in what’s happening in the city and we know what makes a memorable experience. We can help you get access to events, restaurants and venues that are off the beaten track.

features3.title: Exclusive offers
features3.desc: You will benefit from exceptional rates and VIP attention, for multiple products and services, from our network of exclusive partners. That means you can enjoy great value on your leisure activities at the best of times.

programs1.title: Luxury Travel
programs1.desc: Imagine having your own yacht or VIP cars at your fingertips to go wherever you want whenever you want. This is exactly what we offer to our members: exclusive access to a fleet of fine vehicles and yachts for you and your guests no matter where in the world you are. This can all be yours with our VIP services.

programs2.title: Luxury Vacation
programs2.desc: Booking your luxury vacations should be of great importance, especially when it comes to planning your itinerary and choosing the right holiday destinations. Our team of experts and advisors are always ready to assist you in planning the best getaways for you.

programs3.title: VIP Dining
programs3.desc: With our bespoke booking service, it’s easy to ensure you and your guests secure the best views and seats in town without queuing for hours. We know the restaurant scene inside out, so we are uniquely placed to suggest the best restaurants for your requirements and make the reservation for you.

programs4.title: Private / Corporate Event
programs4.desc: Our planning and event management services are available for both private clients and corporate customers. We help you with the entire process, from sourcing venues to organizing catering. Our in-house designers offer a variety of designs and menus so you always have a personalized experience.

about.title: Earn Interest on Wise Premium Credits

features1.title: Step 1: Select A Package
features1.desc: Choose the package that fits your risk tolerance and objective.

features2.title: Step 2: Deposit WP Credits
features2.desc: Easily transfer your WP credits into the package of your choice

features3.title: Step 3: Gain Returns
features3.desc: The program will start working hard for you!

programs1.title: Beat Volatility & Earn Passive Income
programs1.desc:
With Wise Premium, you can put your WP credit to work straight away and have a predictable source of passive income with low risk.

Just choose the programs that you are interested to participate, and start earning WP credits immediately – no further action is needed on your side.

programs2.title: Service for Any Level of Expertise
programs2.desc: Whether you’re new to investment or have owned it for years, we’re here to help. Our client service managers have the knowledge and expertise to address any question.
